faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Lalabel, your data security and using the application.

cta.title: Another question?
cta.description: Feel free to contact us at contact@lalabel.app if you can't find the answer to your question.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely! Your data is processed 100% locally in your browser. No files are sent to our servers - all processing is done directly on your device. Your addresses and orders remain entirely private and secure.

files.question: What do you do with my import files?
files.answer: Nothing at all! Your CSV/TSV files never leave your browser. They are processed locally to extract addresses, then immediately deleted from memory. We do not store, backup or transmit any of your files or personal data.

account.question: Why do I need to create an account?
account.answer: The account only allows us to count the number of active users to improve the service. We only collect your email - no commercial data, no customer addresses, no files are linked to your account.

platforms.question: Which platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Lalabel automatically supports Amazon Seller Central, Shopify, eBay, as well as all generic CSV files. Our system automatically detects your file format and extracts the right address columns. You can also import any CSV with address columns.

formats.question: What print formats are available?
formats.answer: We offer several formats: standard and compact A4, adhesive labels with 10, 14, 16 or 21 labels per page, label rolls for thermal printers, and CSV export. All formats include real-time preview.

pricing.question: How does the freemium model work?
pricing.answer: Lalabel offers you 10 free labels every day, automatically renewed. It's perfect for small shipments. If you need more, our Premium plan at $5/month (or $48/year) gives you access to unlimited labels with priority support.

fileAnalysis.helpImprove: Help us improve our recognition system by sending us your file:
fileAnalysis.privacy: Your data will be used solely to improve the tool (no permanent storage, no commercial use).
fileAnalysis.emailSubject: [Lalabel] File with no detected addresses - Improvement request
fileAnalysis.emailBody:
Hello,

I tried to import a file on Lalabel but no addresses were detected.

File information:
- Platform type (Amazon, Shopify, eBay, other): 
- File format (CSV, TSV, TXT): 
- Approximate number of lines: 
- Content description: 

I'm attaching the file to help you improve the recognition system.

ðŸ”’ PRIVACY:
I understand that this file will be used solely to improve the Lalabel tool and analyze unrecognized formats. The data will not be stored permanently, used for commercial purposes, or shared with third parties. You will keep me informed of improvements made thanks to my help.

Thank you for developing such a useful tool for online sellers!

Best regards
